Package Clinic.Client.Connection

Class AdaptableClient

java.lang.Object
Clinic.Client.Connection.AbstractClient
Clinic.Client.Connection.AdaptableClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
class AdaptableClient
extends AbstractClient
The AdaptableClient is a class that extends the AbstractClient in place of the ObservableClient .

Project Name: OCSF (Object Clinic.Client-Clinic.Server Framework)

Version:
Febuary 2001
Author:
Dr. Robert Laganière

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ObservableClient client
    The proxy used to simulate multiple class inheritance.
